<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Analyze Idiolect](/Feats.aspx?ID=6348) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 203 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=253)

**Prerequisites**
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6344); Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38); Expert in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

</column>

---

You break down a specific individual’s idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits. If you interact with someone for at least 10 minutes, when you later attempt to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2388) that individual, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) checks and DCs. Due to the intense character study required, if you Analyze Idiolect again, it replaces any previous idiolect you memorized.
name: Analyze Idiolect
prerequisite: Linguist Dedication; Expert in Deception; Expert in Society
